item.p: correct sign charts for f, f', and f'';
where the graph of f(x) is positive/negative, increasing/decreasing, and concave up/down;
the value of the limits \displaystyle \lim_{x\to\pm\infty} f(x) ; and
appropriate use of the above data to identify and label all asymptotes (vertical and horizontal), zeroes, critical points, local extrema, and points of inflection.

Warning: Labels on tick marks on auto-generated sign charts are rounded to three significant digits (or are integers). Furthermore, on all auto-generated sign charts, x=0 appears as an unlabeled tickmark. This is an artifact of the automatically generating computer code, and happens whether or not x=0 is, in fact, a "special point" for that sign chart.
